name: Asteroides Boxing
description:
Someone has tried to sabotage your spaceship by replacing your blasters with boxing gloves. Unfortunately, however, this is not enough to calm your inner rage towards giant floating space boulders.

[A]/[D]:   Turning.

[W]:   Accelerate forwards.

[S]:   Brakes.

[Space]:   Fire(Hit?).

See how many points you can score before dying. Reset with [R].

This game was made in about 10 hours for the GamesPlusJam 3 game jam.

The theme for this jam was randomly generated pr. team/individual using a random generator program which can be found on the jam page. My theme was Asteroids + Boxing.

[Bugs:]

It seems like i missed a bug where your lives dont get refilled when restarting, causing you to only have one life when restarting after dying. Just refresh the page to restart for now.

A more major bug is that over time, only the largest type of asteroids spawn, making it impossible to create any asteroids that are better than the orange ones after about 30 seconds.

[Post Jam Stuff:]

I've made a fixed version for download, but i won't replace the one that's playable in-browser until after the voting ends.
